xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description:
This modules defines a set of functions for managing persistent, ordered, and updatable collections.
Please refer to our documentation for more information about the lifecycle management and the manipulation of such collections.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:author: Matthias Brantner, David Graf, Till Westmann, Markos Zaharioudakis

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets the QNames of the collections that are available, if any.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: A sequence comprising one QName for each available collection or an emtpy sequence if no collections are available.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: ddl:available-collections
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function ddl:available-collections() as xs:QName* external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $name The name of the collection to create.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, creates a collection with the given name.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: zerr:ZDDY0002 if a collection with $name already exists.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: ddl:create
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare updating function ddl:create($name as xs:QName) external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Creates a collection and adds the given sequence as content to the new collection.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $name The name of the collection to create.
$content The sequence of items (nodes or JSON items) to be added to the new collection.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, creates a collection with the given name and inserts the given items into it.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: zerr:ZDDY0002 if a collection with the given name already exists.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: ddl:create
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare updating function ddl:create($name as xs:QName, $content as item()*) external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Deletes the collection having the given name.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $name The name of the collection to delete.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: An empty XDM instance and a pending update list that, once applied, deletes the collection with the given name.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:error: zerr:ZDDY0003 if the collection identified by $name is not available.
zerr:ZDDY0015 if any of the in-scope variables references an item that belongs to the collection with QName $name.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: ddl:delete
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare updating function ddl:delete($name as xs:QName) external

xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:description: Gets whether a collection with the given name is available.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:param: $name The QName of the collection that is being checked.
xqdoc:comment.xqdoc:return: true if the collection is available and false otherwise.

xqdoc:function.xqdoc:name: ddl:is-available-collection
xqdoc:function.xqdoc:signature: declare function ddl:is-available-collection($name as xs:QName) as xs:boolean external
